snippet.title: The Mean Greens - Plastic Warfare: Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
We are very excited to announce the launch date of The Mean Greens: Plastic Warfare! This action-packed third person online multiplayer shooter was a blast to make. We hope you enjoy it! (December 8th on Steam)   Steam Link: http://store.steampowered.com/app/360940/

Take part in history's greatest battle of Green Vs. Tan! Fight amongst and against others online. 
Jump, shoot, and roll your way to victory with fast, objective based gameplay.

-10 larger than life environments

-10 objective based battles

- Up to 5 vs 5 players

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/GreenVsTan
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/themeangreens
www.Themeangreens.com
